sn19.21:1.1: “Idhaham, avuso, gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto addasam samanerim vehasam gacchantim.
sn19.21:1.2: Tassa sanghatipi aditta sampajjalita sajotibhuta, pattopi aditto sampajjalito sajotibhuto, kayabandhanampi adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam, kayopi aditto sampajjalito sajotibhuto.
sn19.21:2.3: nanabhuta vata, bhikkhave, savaka viharanti, yatra hi nama savako evarupam nassati va dakkhati va sakkhim va karissati.
sn19.21:2.4: Pubbeva me sa, bhikkhave, samaneri dittha ahosi.
sn19.21:2.6: Ahancetam byakareyyam, pare ca me na saddaheyyum.
sn19.21:2.7: Ye me na saddaheyyum, tesam tam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
sn19.21:2.8: Esa, bhikkhave, samaneri kassapassa sammasambuddhassa pavacane papasamaneri ahosi.
sn19.21:2.9: Sa tassa kammassa vipakena bahuni vassani bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani bahuni vassasatasahassani niraye paccitva tasseva kammassa vipakavasesena evarupam attabhavapatilabham patisamvedayati”ti.
